medical_history.chief_complaint: Low-grade fever and diffuse abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms reportedly existed for the past 2 weeks associated with diaphoresis, chills, and hot flashes. Within the last 24 hours, the pain intensified and became associated with nausea and emesis.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diabetes Mellitus Type 2, Chronic Kidney Disease Stage III, Depression, Hepatitis C, Chronic Lower Back Pain, Prior Laparoscopic Roux-en-Y Surgery, Hysterectomy, Bilateral Knee Replacements, Right Ankle Surgery, Abdominoplasty.
medical_history.social_history: Denies current alcohol use; reports prior alcohol abuse for an unspecified duration and quit years ago; denies tobacco and illicit drug use.
